title: The Daltons Last Raid (Western, 1951) Directed by Sam Newfield | Colorized Movie

sources.title: The Daltons Last Raid (Western, 1951) Directed by Sam Newfield | Colorized Movie
sources.description:
They knew but one law... The Law Of Vengeance!
Tom and Fred Denton, rush to California to save their brother Matt from a wrongful hanging following a train robbery charge. After rescuing Matt, they are framed for crimes they didn't commit and become entangled in more criminal activities with outlaw Bill Devlin. Upon returning to Fort Grant, they plan to rob two banks filled with cattle money, escalating tensions in the territory.

Original title: Three Desperate Men (1951) AKA: The Daltons Last Raid / Three Outlaws

Black & White version: https://youtu.be/1MiPJ6muYKM
This film is is subtitled with many language options.

Director: Sam Newfield
Writer: Orville H. Hampton
Stars: Preston Foster, Jim Davis, Virginia Grey
Genres: Action, Crime, Western


00:00 Full Movie (with subtitles)
09:01 A mother and her sons discuss a burial, back pay, and outlaws in a Western setting.
11:34 Injustice and betrayal unfold as brothers seek justice for a wrongfully convicted sibling in a train robbery case.
17:31 Outlaws on the run face betrayal and pursuit after a wrongful accusation, leading to a desperate escape attempt.
27:20 Outlaws plan to meet at a fishing cabin after committing crimes and being pursued by the law.
37:50 Outlaws plan a train robbery to escape charges, but betrayal and guilt unravel their scheme.
50:15 Outlaws plan a final heist in familiar territory as Thanksgiving approaches, with a former lawman on their trail.
56:17 Outlaws plan a final heist but encounter unexpected obstacles and betrayal.
